description.en: ![](https://github.com/sanskrit-coders/jyotisha/blob/master/jyotisha/panchangam/temporal/festival/images/kanchi-jagadgurus/jagadguru-12.jpg)Initiated by Śrī Cidghanendra, the preceptor Śrī Chandraśekhara, having adorned the Kāmakoṭi Pīṭha for sixty-three years, then having initiated/ imparted on e named Saccidghana, vanished with form in the midst of disciples. He attained his exalted Supreme state on the ninth day of the bright fortnight in the month of Āṣāḍha of the year Ānanda.

shlokas:
zrIcidghanEndraniyataH zaradastriSaSTiM zrIkAmakOTim abhimaNDya tatazca kaJcit.
saccidghanAkhyam anuziSya vRtO'pi ziSyaiH zrIcandrazEkharaguruH savapustirO'dhAt..23..
Anandamayam AnandE ASADhyASADhapUrvakE.
navamyAm anavamyaM svaM padam Apat parAtparam..24..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
